verses.roman:
se puruṣera aṁśa--advaita, nāhi kichu bheda
śarīra-viśeṣa tāṅra--nāhika viccheda

synonyms: se—that; puruṣera—of the Lord; aṁśa—part; advaita—Advaita Ācārya; nāhi—not; kichu—any; bheda—difference; śarīra-viśeṣa—another specific transcendental body; tāṅra—of Him; nāhika viccheda—there is no separation.
translation: Śrī Advaita Ācārya is a plenary part of that puruṣa and so is not different from Him. Indeed, Śrī Advaita Ācārya is not separate but is another form of that puruṣa.
